architecture/ioc-container.title: 🏗️ IoC Container
architecture/ioc-container.description: The Inversion of Control (IoC) container is the heart of Sprout Framework. It manages object creation, dependency injection, and lifecycle for all components in your application.

index.title: 🌱 Sprout Framework
index.description: A lightweight Java web framework built from scratch to demystify how Spring works under the hood.

overview/configuration.title: ⚙️ Configuration
overview/configuration.description: Sprout uses a YAML-based configuration system that's loaded at startup. The AppConfig class handles parsing and provides convenient access to configuration properties.

overview/intro.title: 🌱 Sprout Framework
overview/intro.description: A lightweight Java web framework built from scratch to demystify how Spring works under the hood.

overview/quickstart.title: 🏃‍♂️ Quick Start
overview/quickstart.description: Get up and running with Sprout in just a few minutes!

overview/roadmap.title: 🗺️ Roadmap
overview/roadmap.description: Sprout's development follows a clear roadmap focused on delivering core framework functionality with production-ready quality.
